review: Dr. Bagchi is a very helpful and compassionate physician. Clinic is very well managed and is exceptionally clean and hygienic which is commendable. This time, when I saw him, I was in discomfort from an infection in one of my teeth and wanted to get my fractured front tooth fixed. In addition to saving my front tooth, the doctor restored my smile's aesthetic with zirconia crowns and revived both of my teeth with RCT.
Perfect doctor for teeth issues.****** *** *** *********he explain all the issues in better way...
This was my fourth visit to Dr Bagchi spread over 6-7 years. And, as usual, I‚Äôm reassured that I‚Äôm in really good hands in all aspects.

Overall, we would highly recommend  Dr. Sumanto Bagchi to anyone in need of dental care.  Dr. Sumanto Bagchi is an excellent practitioner who truly cares about their patients and provides top-quality care.

Dear Mrs. Uma Bhalla,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt review! I truly appreciate your kind words and am delighted to hear about your positive experiences at our clinic. Providing courteous and caring service, along with maintaining a hygienic environment, are fundamental aspects of our commitment to patient care.

Your trust in me and the team at our clinic means a lot, and we are honored to be recognized as the best place for dental treatment in your eyes. If you ever have any questions or need further dental care, please feel free to reach out.

Wishing you continued dental health and happiness, and looking forward to serving you in the future.

Best Regards,
Dr. Sumanto Bagchi

We really need more people like you in the medical science field.

reply_text:
Dear Sir/mam,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experiences with our dental care. I'm thrilled to hear that you found our treatments helpful and that you were satisfied with the results. Your kind words about my expertise and approach mean a lot to me.

Ensuring a comfortable and effective dental experience is always my priority, and I'm pleased to know that you felt well taken care of during your visits.

If you ever have further dental needs or questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. It's been a pleasure serving you, and I look forward to continuing to provide excellent care.

Best Regards,
Dr. Sumanto Bagchi
